Text:
thx for this!

English subtitle: http://www.engsub.net/120686/
Crap sound track. Background sounds are pumped to to excruciating high levels during 'quiet' passages. Turn off the auto-levelling feature.

Dear uploader

The sound is really, really bad. It always is with Immerse releases. I really appreciate your upload but you need to get the tech right. I think you might have some kind of auto leveling on.
